name: accessing-data
description: These functions retrieve data and provide table values. The majority of these functions generate a table value referred to as a navigation table. Navigation tables are mainly utilized by the Power Query user interface to offer navigation capabilities across large hierarchical data sets.

name: binary
description: These functions are designed to generate and handle binary data.

name: combiner
description: These functions are utilized by other library functions for aggregating values. For instance, Table.ToList and Table.CombineColumns use a combiner function on each row within a table to generate a singular value for every row.

name: comparer
description: These functions are used to compare values for equality and to establish their order.

name: date
description: These functions are used to generate and modify the date section of date, datetime, and datetimezone values.

name: datetime
description: These functions are designed to generate and modify values related to date and time, as well as time zones.

name: datetimezone
description: These functions are used to generate and handle datetimezone values.

name: duration
description: These functions are designed to generate and handle duration values.

name: error-handling
description: These functions have the capability to track or create errors.

name: expression
description: These functions enable the creation and assessment of M code.

name: function
description: These functions are responsible for generating and executing additional M functions.

name: list
description: These functions are used to generate and modify lists.

name: lines
description: These functions are designed to convert lists of text into binary and individual text values, as well as convert them back again.

name: logical
description: These functions are used to generate and control logical values, which can only be either true or false.

name: number
description: These functions are responsible for generating and manipulating numerical values.

name: record
description: These functions are used to generate and manage record values.

name: replacer
description: These functions are utilized by other functions within the library to substitute a specified value.

name: splitter
description: These functions divide text into separate parts.

name: table
description: These functions are used to generate and modify table data.

name: text
description: These functions are used to generate and modify text strings.

name: time
description: These functions are used to generate and modify time values.

name: type
description: These functions are designed to generate and control type values.

name: uri
description: These functions are used to generate and modify URI query strings.

name: value
description: These functions assess and execute operations on numerical data.

name: literal
description: These functions create literal values for various data types using the # syntax. They provide a direct way to construct values from component parts.
